title: Smoked salmon, pea and broccoli frittata with homemade chips
description: Serve this smoked salmon frittata for a simple supper. Add peas and broccoli to help you on your way to five a day. A tasty nutritious meal that costs less than £2.50 per portion, proving you can eat well for less. Find out how you could cut your food bills with the Eat Well for Less quiz.
ingredients: 3 large floury potatoes, cut into 1cm/½in chips
85g/3oz broccoli (about one quarter of a broccoli head), florets thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
